captions.text:
Refill your hearts with a heat change mug
and dress up your 3DS as a…cat because I’m
Jake and this is episode #28 of Game LÜT.

Get ready for a revolution with some Assassin’s
Creed: Unity inspired clothes. You’ll need

them to hide your Limited Edition life size
Assassins Creed Phantom Blade replica. Keep

building your arsenal with a Harley Quinn
inflatable mallet that’ll go well with a

Harley Quinn dress, or grab a Fire Emblem:
Awakening Falchion (fall-chin) sword. For

something a little louder try a Rabbids Super
Plunger Sound Blaster. Then put on a Destiny

tshirt and blow everyone away with this insane
Thorn hand cannon replica...

Instead of defeating enemies with weapons,
give them a hand with Attack on Titan playing

cards. Unless you feel like taking a Risk...Walking
Dead edition. And Risk can eat up a lot of

time so keep track of it with a Mario Clock
from Japan. It’ll look nice hanging next

to these awesome GameTee art prints GameTee
by AJ Hately...

For a romantic evening, invite over your Boo...necklace,
get a Marvel Dress, Spirited Away dust mite

leggings, light some candles for this awesome
Bat signal candle spotlight and put on a Minecraft

Shovel tee so you can get crafting with a
1-up mushroom cupcake maker and classic controller

molds for making some chocolates. After dessert,
regale them with the Minecraft Soundtrack

Piano Sheet music and up your game with RPG
stats pint glasses.

If the night goes well, write about it in
your BMO Journal, or if it didn’t there’s

always NES Cartridge shaped flasks from Ink
Whiskey so you can play the classics like

Metal Beer or CastleVodka. And who needs human
interaction when ya got a Han Solo/Chewbacca

reversible hoodie, Sonic and Tails Pixelbricks,
Megadrive Plushie, Gravity Rush figure and
this really cool Titanfall Pilot figurine…

For something unique, there are these action
figures that are also functioning Game Boys

like a Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtle, Darth
Vader, or the DeLorean from Back to the Future.

Then whip out your Watch Dogs wallet and get
yourself an amazingly well done custom painted
console by Zoki64...

I’ll give you a second to change your Dragon
Quest Slime Underwear. While you’re changing,

might as well put on a Majora’s Mask shirt
and teleport into DOTA 2 Meepo Cowl.
